mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (userId, userName, userNickname, userPhone, userEmail, userPw) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userPw})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(userId) from user WHERE userId = #{ userId }

SELECT u.userId, userName, userNickname, userPhone, userEmail, userPw, userAdmin, userRegidate, userActive, c.couponId FROM user u LEFT JOIN coupon c ON u.userid = c.userid WHERE u.userId = #{ userId } AND u.userPw = #{ userPw } AND u.userActive = false
SELECT userEmail from user WHERE userId = #{ userId }
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET userPw = #{ newPw } WHERE userId = #{ userId }
UPDATE user SET userActive = 1 WHERE userId = #{ userId }
